title: Electric field direction at point P of two spheres

content.description: Two small spheres have charges +Q and -Q and are located at the bottom corners of an equilateral triangle, as shown in the figure above. The equilateral triangle has sides of length a, and point P is at the top corner of the triangle.
content.question: The direction of the electric field at point P due to the two spheres is

choices.label: toward the bottom of the page
toward the top of the page
undefined, because the magnitude of the electric field at point P is zero
